meanings.definition: A person who is very knowledgeable and enthusiastic about a particular subject or activity.
meanings.sent1: As an aficionado of classic cars, he could identify any make and model on sight.
meanings.sent2: She is an aficionado of science fiction movies and has seen every film in the genre.
meanings.sent3: The coffee aficionado could taste the difference between beans from different regions.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for gardening made her an aficionado of rare and exotic plants.
meanings.sent5: The wine aficionado could detect subtle flavors that others could not.

meanings.sent1: He was an aficionado of basketball and never missed a game.
meanings.sent2: The music aficionado collected vinyl records from his favorite bands.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream aficionado always had a new flavor to try.
meanings.sent4: She was an aficionado of art, visiting galleries and museums regularly.
meanings.sent5: The book aficionado had a library filled with first editions.
